description.value:
You've sworn to slay evil dragons. Add the following tenet to your code after the others: "You must slay evil dragons you encounter as long as you have a reasonable chance of success.

If you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Liberating Step]{Liberating Step} triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)]{Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)}

You don't consider evil dragons to be legitimate authorities, even in nations they rule.
